info.title: MobileNetworkManagementClient
info.description: The resources in this swagger specification will be used to manage mobile network resources

200.description: Delete successful.

202.description: Accepted. Sets 'Deleting' provisioningState until the operation completes. Returns an operation URI that can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about the specified mobile network.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting mobile network resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a mobile network.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update mobile network operation.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting mobile network resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting mobile network resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates a mobile network update tags.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update mobile network tags.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting mobile network resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the mobile networks in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of mobile network resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the mobile networks in a resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of mobile network resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: List sim profile ids under a mobile network.

200.description: List sim profile ids successful.

202.description: Accepted. Returns an operation URI that can be queried to find the current state of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the mobile network resource.

publicLandMobileNetworkIdentifier.description: The unique public land mobile network identifier for the network. This is made up of the Mobile Country Code and Mobile Network Code, as defined in https://www.itu.int/rec/T-REC-E.212. The values 001-01 and 001-001 can be used for testing and the values 999-99 and 999-999 can be used on internal private networks.

spectrumAccessProvider.description: The spectrum access provider for the mobile network.

sims.description: An array of ids of the sims associated with the mobile network resource.

value.description: A list of mobile networks in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

MobileNetworkListResult.description: Response for mobile networks API service call.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the sim resource.

value.description: A list of Sims in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

SimListResult.description: Response for Sims API service call.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the site resource. **TODO**: Confirm if this is needed

networkFunctions.description: An array of ids of the network functions deployed on the sites.

value.description: A list of sites in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

SiteListResult.description: Response for sites API service call.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the sim profile resource.

activationState.description: The activation state of the sim profile resource.

internationalMobileSubscriberIdentity.description: The International Mobile Subscriber Identity (IMSI) for the sim profile.

integratedCircuitCardIdentifier.description: The Integrated Circuit Card ID (ICC Id) for the sim profile.

authenticationKey.description: The ki value for the sim profile.

operatorKeyCode.description: The Opc value for the sim profile.

mobileNetworks.description: A list of mobile network ids that the sim profile is attached. **TODO** Typically one, but can a Sim be attached to multiple networks

deviceType.description: An optional free-form text field that can be used to record the device type this sim is associated with, for example 'Video camera'. The Azure portal allows Sims to be grouped and filtered based on this value.

simPolicy.description: The simPolicy used by this simProfile.

value.description: A list of sim profile ids in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

SimProfileIdListResult.description: Response for sim profile ids API service call.

value.description: A list of sim profiles in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

SimProfileListResult.description: Response for Sim profiles API service call.
